str2: At one time or other, at some time, formerly. From the base of pou and te; indefinite adverb, at some time, ever.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From apo and a derivative of allotrios; to estrange away, i.e. to be non-participant.
Hated, hostile; subst: an enemy. From a primary echtho; hateful; usually as a noun, an adversary.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From dia and nous; deep thought, properly, the faculty, by implication, its exercise.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
